name: serverless-chatbot
description: Serverless chatbot using Watson Assistant as NLP provider
author: Victor Kazuyuki Shinya <vshinya@br.ibm.com>

scripts.create: zip -r action.zip * && ibmcloud fn action create assistant action.zip --kind nodejs:10 && rm -rf action.zip
scripts.deploy: zip -r action.zip * && ibmcloud fn action update assistant action.zip --kind nodejs:10 && rm -rf action.zip
scripts.create-api: ibmcloud fn api create /assistant post assistant --response-type json
